Guests can relax in the large garden, which also provides a childrens playground, or get active at the Postalm ski area 7 km away. Mountain biking as well as cross-country skiing trails are nearby.

The famous city of Salzburg is 30 km from the guesthouse and can be reached by public bus. The spa town Bad Ischl and the Kaiservilla Emperors Villa are 15 km away.

Description:
Posthotel Achenkirch - Adults only in Achenkirch has 5-star accommodation with a shared lounge, a terrace and a bar. Providing a restaurant, the property also has a garden, as well as a sauna and a hot tub. The property features a year-round outdoor pool, indoor pool, fitness centre and free bikes.

At the hotel, each room includes a balcony. Featuring a private bathroom, rooms at Posthotel Achenkirch - Adults only also offer free WiFi, while selected rooms are fitted with a mountain view.

A buffet, continental or vegetarian breakfast is available daily at the property.

The accommodation offers 5-star accommodation with a hammam. You can play tennis at this 5-star hotel, and the area is popular for hiking and skiing.

Speaking German and English, staff are always on hand to help at the reception.

The nearest airport is Innsbruck, 57 km from Posthotel Achenkirch - Adults only, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service. Please note that this is an adult-only hotel. No children are allowed.

Description:
loisis Boutiquehotel is located in Achenkirch, 900 m  from Lake Achen, only 200 metres away from the valley station of the Christlum Ski Area. Free WiFi access is available in the entire building.

The bright and friendly rooms are modern and furnished with wood.The spa area features a sauna, a steam bath and a relaxation room. A fitness room and a sunbathing lawn is available also.

The à la carte restaurant serves traditional regional and international cuisine, homemade pizza, burger and delicious steaks. The heated restaurants terrace offers beautiful mountain views.

The included breakfast buffet offers freshly-squeezed juices, yoghurt from Achentals farmers, free-range eggs and more.

Cross-country ski runs, hiking and mountain bike trails, a golf course, tennis courts and a sailing school are close by to the hotel. In summer you can use e-bikes and bicycles and in winter the entrance for the cross-country ski run and winter hiking trails is right outside the door. In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.
When booking 4 rooms or more, different policies and additional supplements may apply.

Description:
Das Kronthaler in Achenkirch at Lake Achen offers spacious, elegantly decorated rooms and suites with free Wi-Fi. This adult-only property features a 2,500 m² big beauty and spa centre.

The spa centre comes with a 215 m² large indoor and outdoor pool, several sauna, an aroma steam bath, and a relaxation area with outdoor access. A hair salon is available on site.

Situated in the Christlum ski region in the Karwendel Mountains, the property is located directly at the hiking and skiing tracks. You can also go Nordic Walking or cross-country skiing.

Das Kronthaler features a wine collection with a wide selection of fine wines. There is also a sky bar on the sun deck. Guests can choose between full board or half-board. Dinner includes a 5-course menu.

The property has its own onsite ski school and ski and bike rental shops. If you arrive with children, please inform the property about their number and age (see property policies). You can use the Special Requests box when booking or contact the property directly.

Please note that only children older than 14 years can be accommodated in the hotel.
